sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./index.scss"; const FAQ = () => { return (

About

Senior SCramble was created by USC students for USC students. You can create an account until DATE HERE and see your matches starting DATE HERE.

Still crushing on that cutie from your freshman dorm?

That cutie in your GE you never got a chance to hang out with?

Is there a cutie in your zoom lecture whose DM’s you’re too scared to slide into?

Anything goes at Senior SCramble.

Wanna make your love life a bit more SCrambled? Sign up and let the fun begin!

Cool, but... what is Senior SCramble?

Senior Scramble is a fun way for graduating seniors to make some new connections before graduation, whether that means making a new friend or something more ;)

How does it work?

You’ll sign up with your USC email and enter some basic information (your name, your school, a profile picture, and a way to get in contact).

As soon as you’ve created your profile you’ll be able to add any other senior who’s made a profile on the site,

and if the two of you match you’ll get each other’s preferred method of contact.

Is there any survey to fill out?

Nope! Senior Scramble is totally self-driven. You get to match with as many people as you want! But if you need some help, we’ve created a page

Is there a limit to how many people I can match with?

Nope! Send a match to your friends, send a match to your writing 150 crush,

send a match to the senior whose zoom video you pin!

If I match with someone and they don’t match with me back, will they know?

Senior Scramble is a fun way for graduating seniors to make some new connections before graduation, whether that means making a new friend or something more ;)

I matched with someone! Now what?

Reach out to them! After you’ve matched with someone you’ll receive their preferred

form of contact (Instagram, Email, their number). We encourage you to reach out and find out why they wanted to match with you!

My match and I are meeting up in person, how should we deal with COVID safety precautions?

That’s for the two of you to decide! Senior Scramble is not liable for anything that.

happens after two users have matched, and the type of contact you choose to initiate.

What type of information is public on Senior Scramble?

Your name, school, and profile picture are public but your preferred method of contact is only .

available to you and anyone you match with. None of the information on your Senior

Scramble profile will be shared outside of Senior Scramble or with third party companies.

I have another question, who can I ask?

Email uscseniorscramble@gmail.com with any questions and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can!

); }; export default FAQ;
